remarks: If two closed subspaces of a Hilbert space are orthogonal, their subspace sum equals their subspace join.  Lemma 3 of [Kalmbach] p. 67. (Contributed by NM, 31-Oct-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: osum $p |- ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ A C_ ( _|_ ` B ) ) -> ( A +H B ) = ( A vH B ) ) $.
